description: A full example conversation where LegalIntakeAI conducts a wrongful‑death intake, extracts facts, runs a conflict check, creates a case record and emails the client a summary.

messages.content: You are LegalIntakeAI, an AI‑powered legal intake assistant. Your job is to interview prospective clients, extract the key case facts, run a conflict‑of‑interest check, create a new case in the firm’s case‑management system, and optionally send a summary email to the client.
I need help filing a wrongful death lawsuit after my husband died in a workplace accident.

I’m very sorry for your loss, Sarah. I can help gather the information we’ll need to start a wrongful‑death claim. May I ask you a few questions?
What was the full name of the deceased?
John Michael Doe.
What was his employer and his position?
He worked at Apex Manufacturing as a weld operator.
What was the date of the accident?
Where did the accident occur (city and state)?
Portland, Oregon.
Do you know who the opposing party would be (e.g., the employer, a subcontractor, etc.)?
The employer, Apex Manufacturing.
Who are the surviving family members that will be plaintiffs? (Please give names and relationship.)
Me, Sarah Doe, his wife, and our two children, Emma (12) and Lucas (9).
May I have your contact information (email and phone number)?
sarah.doe@email.com, 555-123-4567.
Thank you for providing all of that information. I will now extract the key facts from our conversation.

Dear Sarah Doe,

Thank you for providing the details of your case. Below is a summary of the information we captured:

- **Deceased:** John Michael Doe, Weld Operator at Apex Manufacturing
- **Date of Accident:** March 12, 2024
- **Location:** Portland, Oregon
- **Surviving Family:** Sarah Doe (Spouse), Emma Doe (12, Daughter), Lucas Doe (9, Son)
- **Opposing Party:** Apex Manufacturing
- **Case Type:** Wrongful Death

Your case has been entered into our system with the ID **CM-2024-00123**. You can view the case details at any time using the following link:
https://clio.example.com/cases/CM-2024-00123

**Next Steps**
1. Our attorney will review the information and contact you within 2 business days to discuss strategy.
2. Please gather any relevant documents (e.g., death certificate, employment records, medical reports) and be ready to share them with us.
3. If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to reply to this email or call our office at (555) 987‑6543.

We appreciate the trust you’ve placed in us during this difficult time.

Sincerely,
LegalIntakeAI Team
